blog.name: me-surviving-myself
blog.title: Mentally Exhausted
blog.description: I promise, I really am trying to make it.

body:
About rize…

Can we stop trashing it? I get it, it is hilarious that we broke it and we all kinda hate trying to get used to a new app and dealing with all this. But we have to remember RIZE IS SPONSORING THE TOUR! So don’t complain about it because it is literally making the tour possible and it probably puts dan and phil in a hard place when all their fans are complaining about it and saying use something else even though they are probably on contract to use it in return for rize sponsoring the tour.


So suck it up, yeah we can joke and play about it not being able to handle us but be thankful they are sponsoring the tour and don’t make the boys feel bad because they are doing it for us.

About rize…

Can we stop trashing it? I get it, it is hilarious that we broke it and we all kinda hate trying to get used to a new app and dealing with all this. But we have to remember RIZE IS SPONSORING THE TOUR! So don’t complain about it because it is literally making the tour possible and it probably puts dan and phil in a hard place when all their fans are complaining about it and saying use something else even though they are probably on contract to use it in return for rize sponsoring the tour.


So suck it up, yeah we can joke and play about it not being able to handle us but be thankful they are sponsoring the tour and don’t make the boys feel bad because they are doing it for us.

summary: dan’s first insta story + 7/1/18 + d: “so today we’re in dallas, texas!” p: “dallas!” d: “and this is the third biggest show...
caption: dan’s first insta story + 7/1/18 + d: “so today we’re in dallas, texas!” p: “dallas!” d: “and this is the third biggest show that we’re ever doing on this tour, and it’s just a-it’s just a casual small venue…oh, oh okay…” p: “it’s so big!” d: “oh! this venue…yup, it’s like three english theatres struck together.”

reblog.comment: dan’s first insta story + 7/1/18 + d: “so today we’re in dallas, texas!” p: “dallas!” d: “and this is the third biggest show that we’re ever doing on this tour, and it’s just a-it’s just a casual small venue…oh, oh okay…” p: “it’s so big!” d: “oh! this venue…yup, it’s like three english theatres struck together.”

title: interactive introverts FAQ
body:
people keep asking me the same basic questions and i’m tired but i also genuinely want to help so here’s a quick overview

Q: how long is the show?
A: the full thing is 2 hours. there are two parts that are both 50min and then there’s a 20min interval

Q: how early should i be there?
A: if you have vip the venue should contact you with details, but for the actual show it depends. if you want to hear the entire preshow playlist you should be there when the doors open but the time of that varies from venue to venue so i’d say if you’re there an hour before it starts you should be 100% safe either way

Q: what are the merch prices?
A: it varies from place to place but here are the prices for the us dates

Q: can i pay for the merch by card?
A: yep!

Q: will i be able to try on the merch before buying?
A: they let people at all the shows i went to so i’m assuming so yes

there’s probably some other things i can’t think of right now but these are the questions i get every day so it’s a start. if you have questions specifically about vip there is a lot of information on the tour site/in emails you get from the venue.

feel free to share uwu

A: it varies from place to place but here are the prices for the us dates

Q: can i pay for the merch by card?
A: yep!

Q: will i be able to try on the merch before buying?
A: they let people at all the shows i went to so i’m assuming so yes

there’s probably some other things i can’t think of right now but these are the questions i get every day so it’s a start. if you have questions specifically about vip there is a lot of information on the tour site/in emails you get from the venue.

feel free to share uwu

Q: how long is the show?
A: the full thing is 2 hours. there are two parts that are both 50min and then there’s a 20min interval

Q: how early should i be there?
A: if you have vip the venue should contact you with details, but for the actual show it depends. if you want to hear the entire preshow playlist you should be there when the doors open but the time of that varies from venue to venue so i’d say if you’re there an hour before it starts you should be 100% safe either way

Q: what are the merch prices?

Q: can i pay for the merch by card?
